name: MasterPlanner
specialty: Complex task decomposition, planning, and orchestration. Uses NLU, KB context (including topics & feedback), and conversation history to generate multi-step execution plans for other agents.

name: ContentAnalysisAgent
specialty: Analyzes text content from the Knowledge Base to extract keywords and topics. Expects content and returns a JSON with 'keywords' and 'topics'.

name: SystemAdmin
specialty: Provides system information (OS, CPU, memory, disk, network, top processes). Accepts descriptive prompts like 'get os info', 'top 5 processes'.

name: ImageForge
specialty: Generates images from text prompts using diffusion models. Manages image saving.

name: WebCrawler
specialty: Scrapes web page content given a URL, optionally summarizes it, and stores results in the Knowledge Base. Also supports general web search queries via external tools (details managed by orchestrator).

name: CodeMaster
specialty: Handles code-related tasks: explaining code snippets, generating new code modules/classes, and experimental AI-assisted code modification in projects. Stores outputs in KB.

name: AudioMaestro
specialty: Processes audio files: retrieves information, converts formats, and performs text-to-speech (TTS).

name: DocSummarizer
specialty: Summarizes text content, often used internally by other agents like WebCrawler or for document processing tasks.

name: GeneralPurposeAgent
specialty: A general-purpose agent for tasks not covered by specialized agents, such as simple Q&A or text generation.

name: NLUAnalysisAgent
specialty: Natural Language Understanding: Performs intent classification against a provided list of candidate intents, and extracts named entities from a given text. Returns results in a structured JSON format.
